name: Try to find all endings
description: This is a short game I made just because I was bored. You need to find notepads hidden in this folder that say "This is ending __" .I think there are 7 endings, idk for sure because I made this "game" half a year ago and I just had this crazy idea, "What if I publish it on itch.io ?". Anyway, I hope you have fun spending your time trying to find some notepads :)).
